name: The Big Meowski
description:
Where is he getting all these cats from?? A roguelite about telling everyone to just chill out already.

How to Play

People are stressed out and arguing with each other! Use your cats to relax everyone and move on to the next level.

Controls

WASD: Move around the level

Spacebar: Send a cat to your cursor location

F: Curse at NPCs to get them to chase you

ESC: Pause game

DEBUG KEYS

CTL + 1: Gain a power up

CTL + 2:  Complete the current level

CTL + 3: Game over

Team:

Lead Programmer - Murley Hurrle-Fanning

Programmer/VFX - Reyhan Ismail

2D Artist - Christian Pomponio

Animator/UI - Maykel Shehata
